availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, merchant tailor. Native of Ireland. Married to Mary Penix Lenihan in Stewart County, Tennessee, on June 11, 1859. Father of John Lenihan and Morris Lenihan. Merchant tailor in Eddyville, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, Eddyville, p. 762.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Todd County, Hadensville, p. 403B.
Tennessee State Marriages, 1778-2002, Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, Tennessee, Stewart County Marriages, p. 127 of 627 of microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
